exclusion: Within 1.5 seconds, press 3 times on the link-button.
inclusion: Within 1.5 seconds, press 3 times on the link-button.
label: PLBW10100
overview: Battery powered Motion detector (PIR) with integrated illuminance sensor (separate day/night report) and tamper protection.

parameters.label: Battery Alarm Threshold
parameters.overview:
Percentage value from when the low battery alarm should be transmitted.

    • Adjustable from 5 - 50 in percent

(Hexadecimal: 0x05 - 0x32)

parameters.label: Sensor Activation
parameters.overview:
Enable / Disable the PIR sensor.

    • 0 = Sensor is deactivated

    • 1 = Sensor is activated

(Hexadecimal: 0x00 - 0x01)

parameters.label: Waiting Time
parameters.description: Waiting time between two motion alarms.
parameters.overview:
Waiting time from one motion alarm to the next triggering.

    • Adjustable from 5 - 15300 in seconds

(Hexadecimal: 0x05 - 0x3BC4)

parameters.label: BASIC SET (Association Group 2)
parameters.description: BASIC SET to association group 2 (motion alarm).
parameters.overview:
BASIC SET should be sent after a motion alarm.

    • 0 = Disabled

    • 1 = Enabled

(Hexadecimal: 0x00 - 0x01)

parameters.label: Invert BASIC SET
parameters.description: Invert value of BASIC SET command.
parameters.overview:
Set the value of the BASIC SET command for movement alarm and acknowledgement.

    • 0 = The motion alarm sends the BASIC SET value "On" (0xFF), the acknowledgement sends the BASIC SET value "Off" (0x00)

    • 1 = The motion alarm sends the BASIC SET value "Off" (0x00), the acknowledgement sends the BASIC SET value "On" (0xFF)

(Hexadecimal: 0x00 - 0x01)

parameters.label: Sensor Sensitivity
parameters.overview:
Sensitivity value of the PIR sensor. The value 10 is the highest sensitivity. The value 1 is the lowest sensitivity.

    • Adjustable from 1 - 10

(Hexadecimal: 0x00 - 0x0A)

parameters.label: Pet Immunity
parameters.overview:
Activate/deactivate the pet immunity.

    • 0 = Pet immunity is deactivated

    • 1  = Pet immunity is activated

(Hexadecimal: 0x00 - 0x01)

parameters.label: Light Values
parameters.overview:
Defines which additional reports are to be sent in the event of a movement alarm.

    • 1 = Sensor multilevel report (LUX)

    • 2 = Light alarm report is sent

    • 3 = Lux and light alarm report is sent

(Hexadecimal: 0x00 - 0x03)

options.label: Lux and light alarm report is sent

parameters.label: Light Alarm Threshold
parameters.description: Threshold value for light alarm report.
parameters.overview:
Threshold value from which LUX value the light alarm (day) is sent.

    • Adjustable from 0 - 500 in lux

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.description: Notification Report; Battery Report; Device Reset Locally Notification; Sensor Multilevel Report
associations.overview: The Lifeline Association is automatically established between the Z-Wave controller and the device during inclusion and defines what information is exchanged between the Z-Wave controller and the device.

associations.label: On/Off Control
associations.overview: When the motion alarm is triggered, it sends a BASIC SET On / Off command to the nodes of group 2
